Quote: You seem to be having a lot of nightmares lately. You want to tell me about it?
Food eats people! Also, Momo could talk. You said some very unkind things.
Finding the Avatar is far more important than any individual's safety.
Swishing means it's ripe! It's the ripe juices swishing around, eh?
I think it's true, Katara. Swishing means it's ripe
Out of food and out of money. Now what are we supposed to do?
You could get a job, smart guy.
My joints say there's going to be a storm! A bad one.
Well, it's your joints against my brain.
Then I hope your brain can find someone else to haul that fish, 'cause I ain't comin'.
You don't care about anyone but yourself! Then again, what should I expect from a spoiled prince?
Enough! We're all a bit tired from being at sea so long. I'm sure after a bowl of noodles, everyone will feel much better.
The boy with the tattoos has some sense. You should listen to him!
Boy with tattoos? Airbender tattoos. Well, I'll be a hog monkey's uncle. You're the Avatar, ain't ya?
The Avatar disappeared for a hundred years! You turned your back on the world!
Don't yell at him! Aang would never turn his back on anyone.
Then I guess I must have imagined the last hundred years of war and suffering.
Aang is the bravest person I know. He's done nothing but help people and save lives since I met him.
I'll never forget the day the monks told me I was the Avatar. I was playing with some other kids just outside the South Wall. I was trying to teach them how to do the air scooter.
You chose them from among thousands of toys, Aang. The toys you picked were the four Avatar relics. These items belonged to Avatars past. Your own past lives.
I fear that war may be upon us, young Avatar.
I'm sick of taking his orders! I'm tired of chasing his Avatar! I mean, who does Zuko think he is?
Try to understand. My nephew is a complicated young man. He has been through much.
You can't sacrifice an entire division like that! Those soldiers love and defend our nation! How can you betray them?
As long as I'm his guardian, I will decide when he trains ... and when he gets his butt kicked at Pai Sho.
Zuko had spoken out against the general's plan, but by doing so in the Fire Lord's war room, it was the Fire Lord whom he had disrespected. Zuko would have to duel his own father.
Aang needs to have freedom and fun. He needs to grow up as a normal boy.
You and Aang must be separated! The Avatar will be sent away to the Eastern Air Temple to complete his training.
How could they do that to me? They wanted to take away everything I knew and everyone I loved!
Aang, I'm not going to let them take you away from me. Aang?
And then the Fire Nation attacked our temple. My people needed me and I wasn't there to help.
The world needed me and I wasn't there to help.
You're being too hard on yourself, even if you did run away. I think it was meant to be. If you had stayed, you would have been killed along with all the other airbenders.
I know it was meant to be this way. The world needs you now. You give people hope.
When Prince Zuko saw that it was his father who had come to duel him, he begged for mercy.
Please, Father. I only had the Fire Nation's best interest at heart. I'm sorry I spoke out of turn!
You will fight for your honor.
I meant you no disrespect. I am your loyal son.
You will learn respect, and suffering will be your teacher.

It was no accident. After the duel, the Fire Lord said that by refusing to fight, Zuko had shown shameful weakness. As punishment, he was banished and sent to capture the Avatar. Only then could he return with his honor.
Things will never return to normal. But the important thing is the Avatar gives Zuko hope.
I'm too young to die!
I can't make guesses about what would have turned out if I hadn't run away. I'm here now and I'm going to make the most out of it.
I'm not one to complain, but can't Appa fly any higher?
I have an idea! Why don't we all get on your back and you could fly us to the North Pole?!
I'd love to. Climb on everyone, Sokka's ready for take off.
Winter, spring ... Summer, and fall ... Winter, spring ... Summer, and fall ... Four seasons ... four loves ... Four seasons ... for love
May the great Ocean and Moon Spirits watch over us during these troubled times!
You know, back in my tribe, I'm kind of like a prince, myself.
My apologies, Prince Sokka.
I'm thinking ... maybe we could ... do an activity, together?
For the last time, I'm not playing the tsungi horn!
In our tribe, it is forbidden for women to learn waterbending.
What do you mean you won't teach me? I didn't travel across the entire world so you could tell me no!
It's Princess Yue. I don't get it, one minute she wants to go out with me, and the next, she's telling me to get lost.
Master Poophead won't teach her because she's a girl.
No way am I apologizing to a sour old man like you!
I'll be outside if you're man enough to fight me.
But she didn't love you, did she? It was an arranged marriage. Gran-Gran wouldn't let your tribe's stupid customs run her life.
I just want you to know, I think you're beautiful, and, I never thought a girl like you would even notice a guy like me.
It's what Avatar Roku said. I'm supposed to master all four elements before that comet arrives.
You pretty much mastered airbending and that only took you a hundred and twelve years. I'm sure you can master three more elements by next summer.
Calm down, it's going to be okay. If you want, I can try to teach you some of the stuff I know.
Maybe we can find a puddle for you to splash in.
You could ... clean the gunk out of Appa's toes.
So, while you guys are playing in the water, I'm supposed to be hard at work picking mud out of a giant bison's feet?
Mud and bugs!
For my Pai Sho game. Most people think the lotus tile insignificant, but it is essential for the unusual strategy that I employ.
You've changed our course for a stupid lotus tile
Just push and pull the water like this. The key is getting the wrist movement right.
Well, you had to figure it all on your own. I'm lucky enough to have a great teacher.
My life was hard enough when you were just an airbender.
We've got exactly three copper pieces left from the money that King Bumi gave us. Let's spend it wisely.
No offense Aang, but I'll hold the money from now on.
Earth Nation! Fire Nation! Water Nation! So long as bargains are your inclination, you're welcome here! Don't be shy, come on by!
I've never seen such a fine specimen of lemur.
We prefer to think of ourselves as 'high risk traders.'
Well, well. Look who's come to their senses. Told you the haggling would pay off.
My cabbages! This place is worse than Omashu!
I used to kind of look up to pirates, but those guys are terrible.
Sokka, where do you think they got it? They stole it from a waterbender!
These are real waterbending forms. You know how crucial it is for Aang to learn waterbending!
I've checked all the shops on this pier. Not a lotus tile in the entire marketplace.
Quite the contrary. I always say, the only thing better than finding something you are looking for is finding something you weren't looking for at a great bargain!
For music night on the ship. Now, if we only had some woodwinds.
Will you please shut your air hole? Believe it or not your infinite wisdom gets a little old sometimes!
What about Momo? He's the real victim here.
I'll save you from the pirates.
I need to capture him to restore something I've lost, my honor.
Oh, what? I'm not good enough to kidnap? Ah!
You're really gonna hand over the Avatar for a stupid piece of parchment?
Shut your mouth, you Water Tribe peasant!
I'm just sayin' it's bad business sense. Think how much the Fire Lord would pay for the Avatar. You guys would be set for life.
Thanks, Momo. I owe you a bushel of apples.
Are you so busy fighting you cannot see your own ship has set sail?
Could you two quit congratulating each other and help me out?
Have you lost your mind? This is no time for flute practice!
Prince Zuko, you're really going to get a kick out of this. That lotus tile was in my sleeve the whole time!
Aang, I still owe you an apology. You were just so good at waterbending without really trying. I got so competitive that I put us all in danger, I'm sorry.
Stealing is wrong. Unless it's from pirates.
Sokka, you're supposed to put the tarp on top of the tent. You know, so we don't get rained on?
You're infuriating!
Katara, why don't you worry about gathering firewood, because that kindling is looking pretty sorry.
Why don't you ask Miss Know-It-All, Queen of the Twigs
Oh yeah? Well, you're Mister Lazy Bum, King of the Tents!
Harsh words won't solve problems, action will.
You see that? Settling feuds and making peace, all in a day's work for the Avatar.
You wouldn't be so calm if the Fire Nation destroyed your home and forced you to flee! My whole tribe has to walk thousands of miles to the capital city of Ba Sing Se.
That's the Zhang tribe, a bunch of low-life thieves. They've been the enemies of my tribe for a hundred years.
Sick people get priority over old people.
Maybe you Zhangs wouldn't have so many sick people if you weren't such slobs.
If you Gan Jins weren't so clean, you wouldn't live to be so old.
Absolutely not! We'd rather be taken by the Fire Nation than travel with those stinking thieves!
He's the Avatar, Sokka, making peace between people is his job.
Oh, you babies can go a day without food? Would you rather be hungry, or dead?
He he he, guess the spirits are still angry! Hope you all brought sacrifices.
No bendng ... we need to get out of this canyon ... I won't die down here! I won't become part of the food chain!
Its okay Momo, we'll be out of here soon enough, and then we can eat our weight in leechi nuts!
Maybe the Zhang can climb the wall with their long disgusting fingernails
Oh sorry, I forgot that to the Gan Jin unclipped fingernails is a crime punishable by twenty years in jail!
Oh no, that's a lot of canyon crawlers.
They're coming back for me! They've had a taste and they're coming back for me!
I only took their side 'cause they fed me.
I never thought a Gan Jin could get his hands dirty like that.
I never knew you Zhangs were so reliable in a pinch.
Now where is that custard tart? I'm starving!
See Prince Zuko, a moment of quiet is good for your mental well-being.
Being a man is knowing where you're needed the most.
Perfume? Maybe we can dump some on Appa, because he stinks so much.
Yeah, nothing's cozier than dead animal skins.
Was it you or Dad that put an octopus on your head and convinced Gran-Gran you were a water spirit?
Your dad wore the octopus, but I did the spooky voice.
He means no offense! I'm certain you bathe regularly!
Ice dodging is a ceremonial test of wisdom, bravery, and trust.
How are we supposed to ice dodge without ice?
Of course we do, Aang. But, you're our family, too. And right now, you need us more.
I wish I could give you a little piece of home, Katara. Something to remind you ...
What? You wanna walk into a Fire Nation town where they're all fired-up with their ... you know, fire?
Knowing the Fire Nation, it's probably an execution.
I serve a man. More than a man really, he's a myth, but he's real, a living legend, Jeong Jeong the Deserter.
He's the first person ever to leave the army - and live. I'm the second, but you don't get to be a legend for that.

If a fish lives its whole life in this river, does he know the river's destiny? No! Only that it runs on and on out of his control! He may follow where it flows, but he cannot see the end. He cannot imagine the ocean.
To master the bending disciplines, you must first master discipline itself. But you have no interest in this, so I have no interest in you! Now, get out.

Water is cool and soothing, earth is steady and stable, but fire, fire is alive! It breathes, it grows. Without the bender, a rock will not throw itself! But fire will spread and destroy everything in its path if one does not have the will to control it! That is its destiny!
Feel the heat of the sun. It is the greatest source of fire. Yet, it is in complete balance with nature!
Fire is a horrible burden to bear. Its nature is to consume and without control it destroys everything around it.
Learn restraint, or risk destroying yourself and everything you love.

Water brings healing and life. But fire brings only destruction and pain. It forces those of us burdened with its care to walk a razor's edge between humanity and savagery. Eventually, we are torn apart.
It is you who have embraced savagery, Zhao.
Oh, were we fighting? I thought you were just getting warmed up!
Is that all you got? Man, they'll make anyone an admiral these days!
Oh ... Well then thanks for all the first aid over the years. Like when I fell into the greaseberry bramble. Or that time I had two fishhooks in my thumb!
Oh, and the time that mink snake bit me! Thanks for healing that up. That was great. Really helpful.
The Earth Kingdom city of Omashu! I used to always come here to visit my friend Bumi.
They have buildings here that don't melt!
So what am I supposed to do? Grow a mustache?
Technically, Aang is 112 years old.
Now let's get to skippin', young whipper-snappers. The big city awaits!
No! My cabbages!
Name's Bonzu Pippinpaddleopsicopolis, the Third, and these are my grandkids.
This is the Omashu delivery system. Miles and miles of tubes and chutes.
My cabbages! You're gonna pay for this!
Two cabbages please.
Off with their heads! One for each head of cabbage!
Throw them ... a feast!
The people in my city have gotten fat from too many feasts, so I hope you like your chicken with no skin.
I'm from ... Kangaroo Island!
Oh, Kangaroo Island, eh? I hear that place is really hopping!
Uh, take them to the refurbished chamber that was once bad!
Appa's a ten-ton flying bison; I think he could figure something out.
The real challenges are much more, uh, challenging.

Those delightful rings are made of pure jennamite, also known as creeping crystal. It's a crystal that grows remarkably fast. By nightfall your friends will be completely covered in it. Terrible thing, really. I can stop it, but only if you cooperate.
It seems I've lost my lunch box key and I'm hungry. Ooh, there it is! Would you mind fetching it for me?
Other than the crystals slowly encasing my entire body, doing great!
You thought I was a frail old man, but I'm the most powerful earthbender you'll ever see.
Typical airbender tactic: avoid and evade. I hoped the Avatar would be less predictable.
Did someone leave the windows open? It feels a little drafty in here. Are you hoping I'll catch a cold?
Bumi, you're a mad genius.
It's pretty fun messing with people.
The world has changed in the hundred years that you've been gone. It's the duty of the Avatar to restore balance to the world by defeating Fire Lord Ozai. You have much to learn.
Uh uh. No flying this time.
Think about it: Somehow Prince Zuko and the Fire Nation keep finding us. It's because they spot Appa, he's just too noticeable.
He's a gigantic fluffy monster with an arrow on his head! It's kinda hard to miss him!
Sokka's just jealous 'cause he doesn't have an arrow.
I'm not the boss, I'm the leader.
I'm the oldest, and I'm a warrior, so I'm the leader!
Why do boys always think someone has to be the leader? I bet you wouldn't be so bossy if you kissed a girl.
I've kissed a girl, you just haven't met her.
Walking stinks! How do people go anywhere without a flying bison?
You know who you should ask to carry it for a while? Sokka's instincts.
If you let us pass, we promise not to hurt you.
My name is Jet, and these are my Freedom Fighters, Sneers, Longshot, Smellerbee, The Duke, and Pipsqueak.
Ha, ha, Pipsqueak, that's a funny name.
I guess you could say I've been causing them a little trouble.
One day, we'll drive the Fire Nation out of here for good and free that town.
The Fire Nation killed my parents. I was only eight years old. That day changed me forever.
Sokka and I lost our mother to the Fire Nation.
Have you forgotten that the Fire Nation killed your mother? Remember why you fight!
How can you stand by and do nothing while Jet wipes out a whole town?
Katara, you would too if you just stopped to think. Think about what the Fire Nation did to your mother, we can't let them do that to anyone else, ever again.
Why, Jet? I can't believe I trusted you. You lied to me, you're sick and I trusted you!
No, Jet. You became the traitor when you stopped protecting innocent people.
Water. Earth. Fire. Air. Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked.
Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished.
Katara, you shouldn't have gone on that ship! Now we could all be in danger!
The foreigner(aang) is banished from our village.
Don't you see? Aang's brought us something we haven't had in a long time: fun.
Fun?! We can't fight firebenders with fun!
Fine! Then I'm banished, too! Come on Aang, let's go.
So, you're leaving the South Pole? This is goodbye?
Thanks for penguin sledding with me.
Aang, don't go! I'll miss you!
Wow, I haven't cleaned my room in a hundred years. Not looking forward to that.
All right, ready our defenses! The Fire Nation could be on our shores any moment now!
No potty breaks!
Yeah, I liked her(katara) too.
I've spent years preparing for this encounter. Training, meditating. You're just a child!
Well, you're just a teenager.
Head a course for the Fire Nation. I'm going home.
We have to go after that ship, Sokka. Aang saved our tribe, now we have to save him
It's been so long since I've had hope, but you brought it back to life, my little waterbender.
Aang is the Avatar. He's the world's only chance. You both found him for a reason. Now your destinies are intertwined with his.
Get in, we're going to save your boyfriend
You just looove taking me out of my comfort zone, don't you?
So, I guess you've never fought an airbender before. I bet I could take you both with my hands tied behind my back.
Up. Ascend. Elevate.
Ha! That's from the Water Tribe!
Good news for the Fire Lord. The Fire Nation's greatest threat is just a little kid.
According to legend, you need to first master water, then earth, then fire, right?
the world's been waiting for the Avatar to return and finally put an end to this war.
Sokka, I'm sure you'll get to knock some firebender heads on the way.
I'm just a guy, with a boomerang.
I laugh at gravity all the time.
Hey, we're almost at the Northern Air Temple. This is where they had the championships for Sky Bison polo.
We better find some solid ground, before it finds us.
You just destroyed something sacred! For a stupid bathhouse!
Well, people around here are starting to stink.
Unfortunately, progress has a way of getting away from us
If you like that, wait till you see my finger-safe knife sharpener. Only took me three tries to get it right.

It's filled to the brim with natural gas. Came across it my first time here. Unfortunately, I was carrying a torch at the time. Nearly blew my self and the whole place even more sky high! Thought my eyebrows would never grow back.
Aaaaah! I can't believe I'm flying!
Just make sure you keep your mouth closed so you don't swallow a bug!
a-ack-ack-bleck! Bug! Bug! Ack, that was a bug!
You smell rotten eggs! Then, you just follow your nose to the place where the smell is coming from.
We finally got the war balloon working, thanks to Sokka. This boy's a genius!
Stink! Never underestimate the power of stink!
Aang you were right about air power. As long as we've got the skies, we'll have the Fire Nation on the run.
I still believe that, somehow, the Avatar will return to save the world.
Mmmm ... I can already smell it cookin'.
Why is it that every time you play with magic water, I get soaked?
Look, I'm just saying that if I had weird powers, I'd keep my weirdness to myself.
Leave it to a girl to screw things up!
I even wash all the clothes! Have you ever smelled your dirty socks? Let me tell you, not pleasant!
Please, sit. Why don't you enjoy a cup of calming Jasmine tea?
I don't need any calming tea! I need to capture the Avatar!
Will you go penguin sledding with me?
Right, and this is Katara, my flying sister.
You just sneezed ... and flew ten feet in the air!
Giant light beams, flying bison, airbenders ... I think I got midnight sun madness. I'm going home to where stuff makes sense.
Oh no! I'm not getting on that fluffy snot monster!
Appa, yip-yip!
Their honor didn't hinge on the Avatar's capture. Mine does.
It's not for stabbing! It's for airbending.
Ya know, last time I checked, humans can't fly!
Great. You're an airbender, Katara's a waterbender. Together you can just waste time all day long.
Power in firebending comes from the breath, not the muscles. The breath becomes energy in the body. The energy extends past your limbs and becomes: fire!
No, you are impatient.
but first, I must finish my roast duck.
Listen! Until your fathers return from the War, they're counting on you to be the men of this tribe, and that means no potty breaks!
Aang, I'll help you catch a penguin if you teach me waterbending.
If you want to be a bender, you have to let go of fear.
The last airbender! Quite agile for his old age.
We've got a few options. First; round nuts. And some kind of oval shaped nuts? And some rock-shaped nuts, that might just be rocks.
Shouldn't we run away from huge booms? Not toward them?
Which means no nuts for dinner!
Hey! I worked hard to get those nuts! Yeah, I hate 'em too.
Great hat! I'll trade you some nuts for it.
They're crazy, Mom! I mean, look at how they're dressed.
Fire Nation! Act natural!
They're thugs. They steal from us. And everyone here's too much of a coward to do anything about it.
How can you say that? Haru has a gift! Asking him not to earthbend is like asking me not to waterbend. It's a part of who we are.
I understand that Haru can help you fight back. What can the Fire Nation do to you that they haven't done already?
My father was very courageous. When the Fire Nation invaded, he and the other earthbenders were outnumbered ten to one. But they fought back anyway.
Yeah. Problem is ... the only way I can feel close to my father now is when I practice my bending. He taught me everything I know.
I lost my mother in a Fire Nation raid. This necklace is all I have left of her.
Absolutely not! This village is crawling with Fire Nation troops. If they discover you're here, Aang, we'll be eating fireballs for breakfast. Goodnight.
I'd rather eat fireballs than nuts.
Because they're going to arrest me for earthbending.

I thought you were crazy at first, Katara, but this might work. There are ventilation shafts throughout these mines. All Aang has to do is send an air current from that vent to this one right here. The boulder levitates and ta-da! Fake earthbending.
Get out of my way, pipsqueak!
A giant-eared cretin! Look at those things! Do herds of animals use them for shade?!
I will not back off! I bet elephants get together and make fun of how large your ears are!
That lemur! He's earthbending!
Momo, you have some big ears!
She'll be fine, Aang. Katara knows what she's doing.
You've got guts, Katara. I'll give you that.
I'll talk to the guards. In the meantime, make sure the elderly are taken care of. The rest of us will simply have to hope for warmer weather.
Katara, I admire your courage. And I envy your youth. But people's lives are at stake here. The warden is a ruthless man, and he won't stand for any rebellion. I'm sorry, but we're powerless.

Earthbenders! You don't know me, but I know of you. Every child in my Water Tribe village was rocked to sleep with stories of the brave Earth Kingdom, and the courageous earthbenders who guard its borders.
Yes, they have taken away your ability to bend. But they can't take away your courage. And it is your courage they should truly fear!
It is the strength of your hearts that make you who you are. Hearts that will remain unbroken when all rock and stone has eroded away.
I'm not leaving. I'm not giving up on these people.
Well, sir, it looked like a flying bison.
It was a giant flying buffalo, sir. With an empty saddle.
Then wake up someone I haven't thrown overboard and search the rig! There's something going on here and I don't like it.
wish I knew how to make a hurricane!
Foolish girl. You thought a few inspirational words and some coal would change these people? Look at these blank, hopeless faces. Their spirits were broken a long time ago.
No, please! I can't swim!
Don't worry. I hear cowards float.
The Fire Nation will regret the day they set foot on our land!
He is clearly a master of evasive maneuvering.
You have no idea where you're going, do you?
Simple. Girls are better at fixing pants than guys and guys are better at hunting and fighting and stuff like that. It's just the natural order of things.
Where we're going, you won't need any pants.
Elephant koi, and I'm gonna ride it.
Wait a second, there's no way that a bunch of girls took us down.
A bunch of girls, huh? The Unagi's gonna eat well tonight.
No, don't hurt him! He didn't mean it. My brother is just an idiot sometimes.
He's just upset because a bunch of girls kicked his butt yesterday.
I'm not scared of any girls.
Come on, you know me better than that. I'm just a simple monk.
I can't believe I got beat up by a bunch of girls.
Sorry ladies, didn't mean to interrupt your dance lesson.
I mean, normally I'd hold a grudge, but seeing as you guys are a bunch of girls, I'll make an exception.
A big strong man like you? We wouldn't stand a chance.
Watching you show off for a bunch of girls does not sound like fun
The silk threads symbolize the brave blood that flows through our veins. The gold insignia represents the honor of the warrior's heart.
It's not about strength. Our technique is about using your opponents' force against them
Nice try, Avatar! But these little girls can't save you.
I am a warrior. But I'm a girl, too.
I know it's hard, but you did the right thing. Zuko would have destroyed the whole place if we had stayed.
Great, Aang. Maybe instead of saving the world, you can go into the jewelry-making business.
You mean, all of you or just your neck? I mean, because they both look great!
Smoochie, smoochie, someone's in love!
Stop teasing him, Sokka. Aang's just a good friend. A sweet, little guy! Just like Momo
Someone's being attacked by a platypus bear!
Maybe we should go see Aunt Wu and learn our fortunes. It could be fun.
Oh, come on. Fortune telling is nonsense!
You can't really tell the future!
That rhymes with Meng! And you've got some pretty big ears, don't you?
Don't be modest! They're huge!
Try to keep an open mind, Sokka. There are things in this world that just can't be explained. Wouldn't it be nice to have some insight into your future?
It would be nice to have some bean curd puffs.
That's so romantic! I wonder if my true love will give me a rare flower.
Boring stuff I'm sure. Love, who she's going to marry, how many babies she's going to have.
Your palms are so smooth. Do you use moisturizer?
I feel a great romance for you. The man you are going to marry.
Your future is full of struggle and anguish. Most of it, self-inflicted
You will be involved in a great battle, an awesome conflict between the forces of good and evil. A battle whose outcome will determine the fate of the whole world!
You're just saying that because you're going to make yourself unhappy your whole life.
That woman is crazy! My life will calm and happy and joyful!
Since I got you here, uh, there's something I want to tell you. I like you, but more than normal.
And then you will have your third great-grandchild before quietly passing away in your sleep.
I don't care what Aunt Wu told you! You have to take a bath sometime!
The number once mistake nice guys like you make: being too nice.
Flowers are fine once you're married, but at this early stage, it's critical that you maintain maximum aloofness.
But my heart is telling me to get this flower, and Aunt Wu said if I trusted in my heart, I will be with the one I love.
That Water Tribe girl. I can see why you like her so much.
Just as you reshaped those clouds, you have the power to shape your own destiny.
Wait 'til you see it, Katara! The Southern Air Temple is one of the most beautiful places in the world!
Uggh! Sleep now. Temple later.
Sokka! Wake up! There's a prickle snake in your sleeping bag!
Do you have any ginseng tea? It's my favorite.
Hey, stomach? Be quiet, all right? I'm trying to find us some food.
We're home, buddy! We're home
If my father thinks the rest of the world will follow him willingly, then he is a fool!
I'm just a simple guy, with simple needs.
Your aim has improved greatly, my young pupil.
The key, Sokka, is airbending.
Statues? That's it? Where's the meat?
You just couldn't get any weirder.
I want to eat you!
Once I deliver the Avatar to my father, he will welcome me home with honor, and restore my rightful place on the throne!
If your father really wanted you home, he would have let you return by now, Avatar or no Avatar. But in his eyes you are a failure and a disgrace to the Fire Nation.
An Agni Kai. At sunset.
Aang, I wasn't really going to eat the lemur, okay?
Next time you get in my way, I promise, I won't hold back.
Even in exile, my nephew is more honorable than you.
Monk Gyatso and the other airbenders may be gone, but you still have a family. Sokka and I! We're your family now!
I really am the last airbender.

I want the Avatar, I want my honor, my throne. I want my father not to think I'm worthless.
You might have mixed feelings about attacking members of the Royal Family. I understand. But I assure you, if you hesitate, I will not hesitate to bring you down.
Do the tides command this ship?
Well then, maybe you should worry less about the tides who have already made up their mind about killing you, and worry more about me, who's still mulling it over.
With the kind of power he possesses, power enough to destroy hundreds of battle ships in a matter of minutes, he could defeat the Fire Lord now!
I don't know how to get in or out of the Avatar State, much less what to do once I'm there.
Or just glow it up and stop that Fire Lord!
If you two meat heads want to throw away everything we've worked for, fine, go ahead and glow it up!

Uggh! It tastes like onion and banana juice!

The mines are filled with skunk fish and seaweed. When a ship detonates the mine, the seaweed tangles up the propeller and the foul smell forces people to abandon the ship. I call it the 'stink and sink.'

I'm thankful because you decided to share this special day with me. It means more than you know.
Now let's make these people some tea!
My Fire Chakra would like to eat something other than onion-banana juice.

Tastes like onions and bananas, but strangely something else. Pickles?
I'm tired of wearing this girly disguise. I don't know how anyone could fight in this.
Maybe that's why it was so easy to beat the Kyoshi Warriors and take their clothes.
If I have to clean up one more pile of bear poop, I'm going to throw up.

You have indeed felt a great loss. But love is a form of energy, and it swirls all around us. The Air Nomads' love for you has not left this world. It is still inside of your heart, and is reborn in the form of new love.
Can I have some onion-banana juice, please?
The greatest illusion of this world is the illusion of separation. Things you think are separate and different are actually one in the same.
Yes. We are all one people, but we live as if divided.
Uncle! I need two jasmine, one green, and one lychee!
Wooo! Toph, you rule.
Why would I choose cosmic energy over Katara?
So, Zuzu's in the city, too? I think it's time for a family reunion.
I'm sorry, but I can't let go of Katara.
I am the greatest earthbender in the world! Don't you two dunderheads ever forget it!

We can't wait around to get permission for everything.
That might come back to bite us in the blubber.
If the Avatar keeps searching for his bison, it could upset the delicate balance we've worked so hard to achieve in this city. It could even cost us control of the Earth King.
So, I was thinking about names for my new tea shop. How about the Jasmine Dragon? It's dramatic, poetic, has a nice ring to it.
There is nothing wrong with a life of peace and prosperity. I suggest you think about what it is that you want from your life and why.
I can feel his breathing and heartbeat. When people lie, there's a physical reaction. He's telling the truth.
Maybe Katara should kiss him. That should bring something back!
What do you plan to do now that you've found the Avatar's bison? Keep him locked in our new apartment? Should I go put on a pot of tea for him?
And then what!? You never think these things through! This is exactly what happened when you captured the Avatar at the North Pole! You had him, and then you had nowhere to go!
Is it your own destiny, or is it a destiny someone else has tried to force on you?
I'm begging you, Prince Zuko! It's time for you to look inward and begin asking yourself the big questions. Who are you, and what do you want?
Goooood morning, earthbending student!
Hey, you never called me Sifu Katara.
Sorry, Snoozles, we'll do our earthbending as quietly as we can.
Oh, maybe I could learn to make a whirlpool out of land!
The key to earthbending is your stance. You've got to be steady and strong. Rock is a stubborn element. If you're going to move it, you've got to be like a rock yourself.
No, she's crazy, and she needs to go down.
You've got to stop thinking like an airbender. There's no different angle, no clever solution, no trickety-trick that's going to move that rock. You've got to face it head on.
You're awfully cute, but unfortunately you're made of meat.

Lightning is a pure form of firebending, without aggression. It is not fueled by rage or emotion the way other firebending is. Some call lightning the cold-blooded fire. It is precise and deadly, like Azula.

There is energy all around us. The energy is both yin and yang. Positive energy and negative energy. Only a select few firebenders can separate these energies. This creates an imbalance. The energy wants to restore balance, and in a moment the positive and negative energy come crashing back together, you provide release and guidance, creating lightning.
Remember, once you separate the energy, you do not command it. You are simply its humble guide.
There's nothing to say, you blew it! You had a perfect stance, and a perfect form. But when it came right down to it, you didn't have the guts!
If you're not tough enough to stop the rock, then you can at least give it the pleasure of smashing you instead of jumping out of the way like a jelly-boned wimp!
Yeah, whatever, go splash around until you feel better.
You will not be able to master lightning until you have dealt with the turmoil inside you.
You must let go of your feelings of shame if you want your anger to go away.
Pride is not the opposite of shame, but its source. True humility is the only antidote to shame.
Well, my life has been nothing but humbling lately.

You probably think I deserve this, don't you? Look, I'm sorry I hunted you, but that's just the natural order of things. Big things eat smaller things, nothing personal. But this time it didn't work out that way. I admit it ... you're cute
Okay, you convinced me, if I get out of this alive, it's a karmically correct, vegetarian existence for me. No meat. Even though meat is so tasty.
Fire is the element of power. he people of the Fire Nation have desire and will, and the energy to drive and achieve what they want.
Earth is the element of substance. The people of the Earth Kingdom are diverse and strong. They are persistent and enduring.
Air is the element of freedom. The Air Nomads detached themselves from worldly concerns and found peace and freedom. Also, they apparently had pretty good senses of humor!
Water is the element of change. The people of the Water Tribe are capable of adapting to many things. They have a deep sense of community and love that holds them together through anything.
It is important to draw wisdom from many different places. If you take it from only one place, it becomes rigid and stale.
Understanding others, the other elements, and the other nations will help you become whole.
It is the combination of the four elements in one person that makes the Avatar so powerful.
Aang, I found these nuts in your bag. I figured you wouldn't mind. And besides, even if you did, you're too much of a pushover to do anything about it.
Okay, karma person or thing, whoever's in charge of this stuff. If I can just get out of this situation alive, I will give up meat and sarcasm. Okay?
That's all I got. It's pretty much my whole identity. Sokka, the meat and sarcasm guy. But I'm willing to be Sokka, the veggies and straight talk fellow. Deal?
Aggh, stop, stop! You're going to pull my fingers off and I don't think the rest of me is coming!
Aang, this is my friend, Foo Foo Cuddlypoops. Foo Foo Cuddlypoops, Aang.
Waterbenders deal with the flow of energy. A waterbender lets their defense become their offense, turning their opponents' energy against them.
f you let the energy in your own body flow, the lightning will follow it. You must create a pathway from your fingertips, up your arm to your shoulder, then down into your stomach.
The stomach is the source of energy in your body. It is called the sea of chi. Only in my case it is more like a vast ocean.
But I'm not going to shoot lightning at you! If you're lucky, you will never have to use this technique at all!
Earthbend, Twinkle Toes. You just stood your ground against a crazy beast. And even more impressive, you stood your ground against me. You've got stuff.
Awww, this is a really wonderful, touching moment. So could you get me out of here so I can give you both a big, snuggly hug?
The whole time, I was in that hole, not knowing if I was going to live or die. It makes a man to think about what's really important.
Appa, Appa, I can earthbend now! The key is being completely rooted. Physically and mentally unmovable!
You've always thrown everything you could at me! Well, I can take it, and now I can give it back! Come on, strike me! You've never held back before!
One good hour after weeks of trouble isn't much of a roll.
I've seen enough of Ba Sing Se. And I can't even see!
I don't trust the new positive Sokka. Long Feng brainwashed you, didn't he!?
Surface-to-air rocks! More incoming!
How should I know? I'm still voting we leave Ba Sing Se.
You invade my palace, lay waste to all my guards, break down my fancy door, and you expect me to trust you?
See? We're friends, Your Earthiness.
That happens to be a large birth mark. Thanks for showing everyone.
So this is what a train is like? I didn't realize it would be this ... public.
Dai Li! Arrest Long Feng! I want him to stand trial for crimes against the Earth Kingdom.
Looks like Long Feng is long gone! Ha! Ah, yeah, I've been waiting to use that one.
All this time, what I thought was a great metropolis was merely a city of fools. And that makes me the king fool.
You should know that this is not a natural sickness, but that shouldn't stop you from enjoying tea.
Your critical decision. What you did beneath that lake. It was in such conflict with your image of yourself that you are now at war within your own mind and body.
You are going through a metamorphosis, my nephew. It will not be a pleasant experience, but when you come out of it, you will be the beautiful prince you were always meant to be.
Aahh! Great. That's enough. Okay, we love each other. Seriously.
Everything is gonna work out perfectly. From now on and forever.
But just to be on the safe side ... Mai and Ty Lee, take the earthbenders out!
I assure you the Fire Nation cannot penetrate this wall. Many have tried to break through it, but none have succeeded.
Nevertheless, that is why the city is named Ba Sing Se. It's the 'impenetrable city'. They don't call it Na Sing Se. That means 'penetrable city.'
So I'm the only one who can ever come up with a plan? That's a lot of pressure.
But may I just say you're like a flower in bloom. Your beauty is intoxicating.
You're pretty easy on the eyes yourself, handsome. Raorr! Welcome to Ba Sing Se
Ty Lee. She doesn't look dangerous, but she knows the human body and its weak points. It's like she takes you down from the inside.
Hey, look at that dust cloud. It's so ... poofy. Poof.
It's so dark down here, I can't see a thing!
No way am I going in that metal monster. I can't bend in there. I'll try to slow it down out here.
Blaugh! Ugh, coldest tea in Ba Sing Se is more like it! What a disgrace!
I know you're not supposed to cry over spilled tea, but ... it's just so sad!
What's this 'we' stuff? Aang and I are going to have to do all the work.
Look, I'm the plan guy. You two are the cut stuff up with waterbending guys. Together, we're Team Avatar!
She can shoot all the lightning she wants at me. I am not going in that wall sludge juice.
Why don't you try blocking my chi now, circus freak?
Soldiers, whatever you do, don't stop shooting rocks down there!
You know, I'm just about sick and tired of you telling me what to do all day! You're like a chattering hog-monkey!
What I'd give to be a metalbender.
Enough with the Team Avatar stuff. No matter how many times you say it, it's not going to catch on.
How about ... the Boomeraang Squad! See it's good because it's got 'Aang' in it. Boomeraang.
The Aang Gang?
The Fearsome Foursome?
Hey, don't jinx it! We can still be attacked by some giant exploding Fire Nation spoon. Or find out the city's been submerged in an ocean full of killer shrimp!
You been hitting the cactus juice again?
I'm just sayin', weird stuff happens to us.
It's just a bunch of walls and rules. You wait, you'll get sick of it in a couple of days.
Hello, my name is Joo Dee! I have been given the great honor of showing the Avatar around Ba Sing Se. And you must be Sokka, Katara, and Toph! Welcome to our wonderful city. Shall we get started?
You're in Ba Sing Se now. Everyone is safe here.
This city is a prison. I don't want to make a life here.
Life happens wherever you are, whether you make it or not.
Blech! This tea is nothing more than hot leaf juice!
How could a member of my own family say something so horrible?!
Those men are agents of the Dai Li, the cultural authority of Ba Sing Se. They are the guardians of all our traditions!
The Earth King is very busy running the finest city in the world!
Shh, listen, you can't mention the War here. And whatever you do, stay away from the Dai Li.
We've been working in a tea shop all day! I'm sick of tea!
Sick of tea? That's like being sick of breathing!

I learned proper society behavior and chose to leave it. You never learned anything. And frankly, it's a little too late.

Good evening, Mr. Sokka Water Tribe, Ms. Katara Water Tribe, Lord Momo of the Momo Dynasty. Your Momo-ness.
Avatar Aang, how do you do? Go on.
Katara might be able to pull it off, but you two would be lucky to pass as busboys!
Wow, you look beautiful.

Maybe you've forgotten why we need to start over. Maybe you've forgotten about how the Fire Nation left us all homeless. How they wiped out all the people we loved.
The secret ingredient is love.

Somebody's a little light on his feet! What's your fighting name: the Fancy Dancer?
What are you doing here, Twinkle Toes?!
Don't answer to Twinkle Toes, it's not manly!
What Aang is trying to say is, he's the Avatar. And if he doesn't master earthbending soon, he won't be able to defeat the Fire Lord.
I'd like to defeat the Fire Lord by the end of summer, but I can't do that without finding an earthbending teacher first.
Even though I was born blind, I've never had a problem seeing. I see with earthbending. It's kind of like seeing with my feet. I feel the vibrations in the Earth, and I can see where everything is.
You think you're so tough? Why don't you come up here so I can snap that grin off your face?
I love fighting. I love being an earthbender, and I'm really, really good at it.
You're going to be a great teacher, Toph.
That's not gross, it's just a part of spring! You know, rebirth, flowers blooming and Appa gets a new coat.
I'm just glad we finally have another girl in the group, because you two are disgusting.
Excuse me, does anyone have a razor? Because I've got some hairy pits!
Katara, I'm fine. I can carry my own weight. I don't need a fire, I've already collected my own food and look,  my tent's all set up.
Your powers of perception are frightening.
Really? You need me to help unload Sokka's funky-smelling sleeping bag?
Look here, sugar queen, I gave up everything I had so that I could teach Aang earthbending. So don't you talk to me about being selfish!
Okay, forget about setting up camp. I'm finding the softest pile of dirt and going to sleep.
Oh, just some angry freak with a ponytail who's tracked us all over the world.
What's wrong with ponytails, Ponytail?
Well, it certainly tells the other warriors that you're fun and perky.
Maybe we should face them. Find out who they are. Who knows, maybe they're friendly.
Okay, three on three plus Sokka.
Well, we wanted to find out who they were and we found out. Now let's get out of here.
The crazy blue firebending and the flying daggers are bad enough, but last time we saw them, one of those girls did something that took my bending away. That's scary.
Hey, I never asked you for diddly-doo-dah.
Ow ... That really hurt my tailbone.
Hmmm ... they're not wads, they're more like bundles, or bunches? It's got an 'uh' sound.
Thanks Appa, I don't know what we'd do without you.
Was it just me, or was that guy kind of cute?
You mean you haven't guessed? You don't see the family resemblance? Here's a hint. I must find the Avatar to restore my honor! It's okay, you can laugh. It's funny.
I poured your tea because I wanted to and for no other reason.
People see me and think I'm weak. They want to take care of me, but I can take care of myself, by myself.
There is nothing wrong with letting the people who love you help you.
Not that I love you, I just met you.
I know he doesn't want me around him right now, but if he needs me, I'll be there.
Sharing tea with a fascinating stranger is one of life's true delights.
Oh, and about your nephew, maybe you should tell him that you need him, too.
I was wondering when you'd show up, Zuzu.
Well, look at this. Enemies and traitors, all working together. I'm done. I know when I'm beaten. You got me. A princess surrenders with honor.
It would be nice if your Avatar powers could be just a little more specific from time to time.
This coup must be swift and decisive. The Earth King and each of the five generals must be taken out simultaneously.
If I sense any disloyalty, any hesitation, any weakness at all, I will snuff it out.
Nice speech, Azula. It was pretty and poetic, but also scary in a good way.
I thought you were going to make that one guy pee his pants.

Many times I imagined myself here, at the threshold of the palace.  But I always thought I would be here as a conqueror. Instead, we are the Earth King's personal guests, here to serve him tea. Destiny is a funny thing.
Have you met the Dai Li? They're earthbenders, but they have a killer instinct that's so firebender. I just love it.
You're so dramatic. What? Are you going to challenge me to an Agni Kai?
I met him in the woods once and knocked him down. Then he gave me some tea and some very good advice.
Then we'll work together to fight Azula, and save Katara and Zuko.

You're a terrible person! You know that? Always following us! Hunting the Avatar! Trying to capture the world's last hope for peace! But what do you care? You're the Fire Lord's son. Spreading war and violence and hatred is in your blood!
We should split up. Aang, you go with Iroh to look for Katara and the angry jerk, no offense.
Toph thinks you give pretty good advice, and great tea!
Perfection and power are overrated. I think you were very wise to choose happiness and love.
Sometimes, life is like this dark tunnel. You can't always see the light at the end of the tunnel, but if you just keep moving, you will come to a better place.
What are you in time for, cutie?
Uh, I'm kinda involved with Suki.
Oooh, it's like we're dancing together!
Now comes the part where I double cross you. Dai Li, arrest the Fire Nation princess!

I can see your whole history in your eyes. You were born with nothing, so you've had to struggle, and connive, and claw your way to power. But true power, the divine right to rule, is something you're born with.
You've beaten me at my own game.
Don't flatter yourself! You were never even a player.

I used to think this scar marked me. The mark of the banished prince, cursed to chase the Avatar forever. But lately, I've realized I'm free to determine my own destiny, even if I'll never be free of my mark.

You're not the man you used to be, Zuko. You are stronger and wiser and freer than you have ever been. And now you have come to the crossroads of your destiny. It's time for you to choose. It's time for you to choose good.

I need you, Zuko. I've plotted every move of this day, this glorious day in Fire Nation history, and the only way we win is together. At the end of this day, you will have your honor back. You will have Father's love. You will have everything you want.
Zuko, I am begging you. Look into your heart and see what it is that you truly want.
Come on, it's easy. You just walk on your front paws instead of your rear ones.
I betrayed Uncle.
The Earth Kingdom ... has fallen.
I can't believe it. I know the War has spread far, but Omashu always seemed ... untouchable.
A secret passage? Why didn't we just use this last time?
Uh, he has pentapox, sir. Umm, it's highly contagious.
Oh, it's so awful. I'm dying
Thank you, sewer friends.
The Royal Procession is dead weight. If I want to catch my prey, I must be agile, nimble. I need a small, elite team. It's time to visit some old friends.
There really is no fathoming the depths of my hatred for this place.
I thought my life was boring in the Fire Nation, but this place is unbearably bleak. Nothing ever happens.
Certainly our parents didn't send us to the Royal Fire Academy for Girls to end up in ... places like this.
But the truth is, I'm really happy here. I mean, my aura has never been pinker!
I'll take your word for it. Well, I wouldn't want you to give up the life you love just to please me.
The day of the invasion, we readied ourselves for battle. We were prepared to defend our city ... to fight for our lives and for our freedom. But before we even had a chance, King Bumi surrendered.
You don't understand. They've taken our home, and we have to fight them at any cost!
You're all about to come down with a nasty case of pentapox.
Okay everyone! Into sick formation.
Come on, Flopsie. You gotta help me find Bumi. Yip Yip! Oh ... I guess that doesn't work with you. Let's go!
The universe has given me strong hints that it's time for a career change. I want to join you on your mission.
No! Bad Fire Nation baby!
Please tell me you're here to kill me.
We're trading a two year old for a king. A powerful, earthbending king?
There are options in fighting, called jing. It's a choice of how you direct your energy.
Well, technically there are eighty-five, but let's just focus on the third. Neutral jing is the key to earthbending. It involves listening and waiting for the right moment to strike.
Your teacher will be someone who has mastered neutral jing. You need to find someone who waits and listens before striking
Choose well. A sky bison is a companion for life.
No sudden movements. He's been lost for a while and he looks like he's hurt. He's shy around people and scared. Stay low and stay quiet.
My, my, you're easy to find. It's really astounding my brother hasn't captured you yet.
Who are you? The Avatar's fan girls?
Oh, I get it. Good one, Azula.
No Avatar, huh. Well, that's okay. Any friend of the Avatar is an enemy of mine!
You're so colorful, it's making me nauseous.
You're not prettier than we are.
Afraid of fire, I see. That's good. You should be.
Don't you know fans just make flames stronger?
I know I'm not the person you expected. And I didn't expect to be licked by a giant tongue just now. The world is full of surprises.
Oh, dear. You've been through so much recently. Hurt and betrayed. So twisted up inside. You're still full of love. Ah. But fear has moved in where trust should be.
Oh, your emotions are so turbulent. Like swirling storm clouds. Let the clouds in your mind be gentle, peaceful ones.
You and the Avatar's energies are mixed. You have an unbreakable bond. By reading your energy, I can sense where Aang is.
Funny, what invisible strings connect us all.
You just didn't care! You never liked Appa! You wanted him gone!
That's all any of you guys care about, yourselves! You don't care whether Appa is okay or not!
Would you like some tea first? I'd love some. How about you, Kahchi? I make you as a jasmine man. Am I right?
Hmmm ... Old friends that don't want to attack me ...
If I sweat anymore, I don't think sticking together will be a problem.
We're drinking your bending water. You used this on the swamp guy! Urch!
Sokka, wait! You shouldn't be eating strange plants!
Suit yourself. It's very thirst quenching though.
Drink cactus juice. It'll quench ya! Nothing's quenchier. It's the quenchiest!
Who lit Toph on fire?
Can I get some of that cactus?
How did we get out here in the middle of the ocean?
It's a giant mushroom! Maybe it's friendly!
Friendly mushroom! Mushy giant friend!
As far as I can feel, we're trapped in a giant bowl of sand pudding. I got nothin'.
Why don't we ask the circle birds?
Ugh ... We're getting out of this desert, and we're going to do it together! Aang, get up. Everybody, hold hands. We can do this. We have to.
Momo, no! You've killed us all!
What?! I didn't steal anything! Who told you that? It was you! You ratted me out!
What are you old gasbags talking about?
I always tried to tell you that Pai Sho is more than just a game.
Yesterday my mouth tasted like mud. Now it just tastes like sand. I never thought I'd miss the taste of mud so much.
Appa? But why would Princess Yue need him? She's the moon! She flies by herself!
Ow! Crud! I am so sick of not feeling where I'm going! And what idiot buried a boat in the middle of the desert?
Now that you played Pai Sho, are you going to do some flower arranging, or is someone in this club going to offer some real help?
One who has eaten the fruit and tasted its mysteries.
Take it easy little lady. I'm sure the sand folks who built this baby know how to get around here
I think my head is starting to clear out the cactus juice.
You've been hallucinating on cactus juice all day and then you just lick something you find stuck to the wall of a cave?!
We can hide in plain sight there. And it's the safest place in the world from the Fire Nation. Even I couldn't break through to the city.
You muzzled Appa?
Maybe a chicken flew over.
I'll take you to my house and feed your ostrich horse for you. Come on, I owe you!
Anyone who can hold his own against those bully soldiers is welcome here. Those men should be ashamed to wear Earth Kingdom uniforms.
That's what moms are like. If you mess with their babies, they're gonna bite you back!
I am not cart-wheeling.
We are brother and sister. It's important for us to spend time together! Don't you think so, Mom?
Girls are crazy!
I still think our dad would make a much better Fire Lord than His Royal Tea-Loving Kookiness.
Keep in mind, these are dual swords. Two halves of a single weapon. Don't think of them as separate, 'cause they're not. They're just two different parts of the same whole.
You waste all your time playing with knives. You're not even good!
No, it means Uncle's a quitter and a loser.
He found out his son died and he just fell apart! A real general would stay and burn Ba Sing Se to the ground, not lose the battle and come home crying.
Fire Lord Azulon ... can't you just call him 'Grandfather'? He's not exactly the powerful Fire Lord he used to be. Someone will probably end up taking his place soon.
That's who you are, Zuko. Someone who keeps fighting even though it's hard.
I'm only telling you for your own good. I know! Maybe you could find a nice Earth Kingdom family to adopt you!
Azula always lies.

It doesn't matter who I am. But I know who you are. You're not soldiers; you're bullies. Freeloaders, abusing your power. Mostly over women and kids. You don't want Lee in your army  you're sick cowards messing with a family who's already lost one son to the war.
Remember this, Zuko. No matter how things may seem to change, never forget who you are
My name is Zuko. Son of Ursa and Fire Lord Ozai. Prince of the Fire Nation, and heir to the throne.
I know you're nervous, but remember, firebending in it of itself is not something to fear.
Sorry, Sifu Hotman.
Hey, jerks! Mind if I watch you two jerks do your jerkbending?
I'm sorry. I'm just laughing at the irony. You know, how it would've been nice for us if you lost your firebending a long time ago.
Maybe your firebending comes from rage and you just don't have enough anger to fuel it the way you used to.
Sooo, all we need to do is make Zuko angry. Easy enough.
Look, even if you're right, I don't want to rely on hate and anger anymore. There has to be another way.
They were blind, just like me. So we understood each other. I was able to learn earthbending, not just as a martial art, but as an extension of my senses.
It's like the monks used to tell me. Sometimes, the shadows of the past can be felt by the present.
Appa's right, Zuko. In our group, typically we start our missions with a more up-beat attitude.
Zuko, I think the past is trying to kill me.
But I thought your uncle was ... I don't know, good?
Monkeyfeathers! The solstice again? We can't wait here that long.
You know, Zuko, I don't care what everyone else says about you. You're pretty smart.
Zuko, get over here! I want you to dance with me!
Think about our place in the universe?
I know my people have distorted the ways of firebending, to be fueled by anger and rage. But now I want to learn the true way, the original way.
Umm, Mister Sun Chief Sir, yeah, I'm not a firebender yet. Couldn't my friend here carry my fire for me?
You can do it. I know you can. You're a talented kid.
All this time, I thought firebending was destruction. Since I hurt Katara, I've been too afraid and hesitant. But now I know what it really is ... it's energy, and life.

That's why my firebending was so weak before. Because for so many years, hunting you was my drive ... it was my purpose. So when I joined you, I lost sight of my inner fire. But now, I have a new drive. I have to help you defeat my father and restore balance to the world.
We'll just tap-dance our way to victory over the Fire Lord.
Aang, good to see you back with the living, buddy!
I've got a lot on my mind. It's been so long, over three years since I was home. I wonder what's changed. I wonder how I've changed.
I just asked if you were cold, I didn't ask for your whole life story.
I went down! I didn't just get hurt, did I? It was worse than that. I was gone! But you brought me back.
So we're planning a smaller invasion. Just a ragtag team of our friends and allies from around the Earth Kingdom. We already ran into Pipsqueak and The Duke.
Yep, the whole world thinks you're dead! Isn't that great?
Mai has been in a strangely good mood lately.
Load the Toph!
The universe just loves proving me wrong, doesn't it?
I need to redeem myself. I need my honor back.
You've been away for a long time. I see the weight of your travels has changed you. You have redeemed yourself, my son. Welcome home.
I understand why you left. I really do, and I know that you had to go, so why do I still feel this way? I'm so sad and angry and hurt!

I love you more than anything. You and your brother are my entire world. I thought about you every day when I was gone and every night when I went to sleep, I would lie awake missing you so much it would ache.

If anyone is to blame for the state of the world, it is me. I should have seen this war coming and prevented it. You inherited my problems and my mistakes. But I believe you are destined to redeem me and save the world.
You're right. I won't give up.
Great job with the cloud camo, but next time, let's disguise ourselves as the kind of cloud that knows how to keep its mouth shut.
Hey, we're in enemy territory. Those are enemy birds.
Sokka, we don't need to become cave people. What we need is some new clothes.
Plus, they have real food out there. Does anyone want to sit in the dirt and eat cave hoppers?
Looks like we got outvoted, sport. Let's get some new clothes.
I used to visit my friend Kuzon here a hundred years ago. So, everyone just follow my lead and stay cool. Or, as they say in the Fire Nation, 'stay flamin'.
Greetings, my good hotman.
Come on, Aang, everyone here eats meat. Even the meat.
Very well. What is your name? Or should we just call you 'Mannerless Colony Slob'?
Aang, I'm trying to be mature and not immediately shoot down your idea, but it sounds ... really terrible.
Flamey-O, Hotman!
I know, I'm a terrible tsungi hornist.
Firebenders ... Fire Lord ... wah, bah, blah, blah.
Is that a trick question? The Air Nomads didn't have a formal military. Sozin defeated them by ambush.
Don't you worry, Mr. Headmaster. I'll straighten this boy out somethin' fierce! Young man, as soon as we get home you're gonna get the punishment of a lifetime!
You're so beautiful when you hate the world.
What could you possibly do for a country of depraved little fire monsters?
Don't think of it as a dance party, but as a cultural event celebrating the art of fancy footwork!
Oh boy. Listen guys, dancing isn't something you think about. It's a form of self-expression that no one can ever take away from you.
Who knew Twinkle Toes could dance?
Don't worry about them. It's just you and me right now.
We're safe Sokka, you can take off the mustache, now.
You mean getting thoroughly spanked by the Fire Nation or having to walk all the way to the Western Air Temple?
Uhhh ... I think your feet need their eyes checked.
Well, if you ask me, the new plan is the old plan! You just need to master all four elements and confront the Fire Lord before the comet comes.
Hello ... Zuko here
Uhhh ... so, the thing is I have a lot of firebending experience, and I'm considered to be pretty good at it.
I mean, I thought I was good before, but I realize I was bad
What would Uncle do? Zuko, you have to look within yourself to save yourself from your other self. Only then will your true self, reveal itself.
What would Azula do? Listen, Avatar, I can join your group, or I can do something unspeakably horrible to you and your friends.
Right. Well, uhhh ... anyway ... what I wanted to tell you about is that I've changed, and I, uhhh, I'm good now, and well I think I should join your group, oh, and I can teach firebending to you.
I've done some good things! I mean, I could have stolen your bison in Ba Sing Se, but I set him free. That's something!
If you won't accept me as a friend, then maybe you'll take me as a prisoner.
And you made us suck on frozen frogs? How could I forget? I had a wart on the flap that hangs down from the back of my throat for a month!
Oh, hooray! In a lifetime of evil, at least he didn't add animal cruelty to the list.
You're right, Toph! Let's go find him and give him a medal. The 'not as much of a jerk as you could have been' award!
Ergh! I'm beginning to wonder who's really the blind one around here!
Uggh! Why am I so bad at being good?
See? You trusted Zuko, and you got burned. Literally!
Yeah, get him to come back and say he'll be our prisoner, then we'll jump him and really make him our prisoner. He'll never suspect it!
Not being able to see with your feet stinks.

I've been through a lot in the last few years, and it's been hard. But I'm realizing that I had to go through all those things to learn the truth. I thought I had lost my honor, and that somehow my father could return it to me. But I know now that no one can give you your honor. It's something you earn for yourself, by choosing to do what's right. All I want to do now is play my part in ending this war, and I know my destiny is to help you restore balance to the world.
Fire can be dangerous and wild, so as a firebender, I need to be more careful and control my bending, so I don't hurt people unintentionally.

I think you are supposed to be my firebending teacher. When I first tried to learn firebending, I burned Katara, and after that, I never wanted to firebend again. But now I know you understand how easy it is to hurt the people you love. I'd like you to teach me.
So, here you go, home sweet home, I guess, you know, for now. Unpack? Lunch, soon? Uhhh ... welcome aboard?
You know Prince Zuko, destiny is a funny thing. You never know how things are going to work out. But if you keep an open mind, and an open heart, I promise you will find your own destiny someday.

So let me tell you something, right now. You make one step backward, one slip-up, give me one reason to think you might hurt Aang, and you won't have to worry about your destiny anymore. Because I'll make sure your destiny ends ... right then and there. Permanently.
Sokka, sneak attacks don't work if you yell it out loud.
I'll give you a mud pie!
I gotta say, I like the idea of not talking to you.
Hey! I only cheated because he was cheating! I cheated a cheater. What's wrong with that?
Could you for once stop being such a sourpuss and just lighten up?
Speaking of that 'third-eyed freak', I think I've come up with a name for him. What do you think of 'Sparky-Sparky-Boom Man'?
Hawky, welcome to Team Avatar. My name's Sokka, and I'm your new owner, and as such I should warn you that there's already a lemur in our group, so I don't wanna see any fighting.
Hawky! Make nice! Bad Hawky!
I know this is from you, Sokka! Toph can't write!
I can't believe we forgot Toph can't write.

When our mom died, that was the hardest time in my life. Our family was a mess, but Katara? She had so much strength. She stepped up and took on so much responsibility. She helped fill the void that was left by our mom.

I'm gonna tell you something crazy. I never told anyone this before, but honestly? I'm not sure I can remember what my mother looked like. It really seems like my whole life, Katara's been the one looking out for me. She's always been the one that's there. And now, when I try to remember my mom, Katara's is the only face I can picture.

The truth is sometimes Katara does act motherly, but that's not always a bad thing. She's compassionate and kind, and she actually cares about me. You know, the real me. That's more than my own mom. Don't ever tell her I said any of this!
Actually I wasn't going to apologize. I was gonna say ... I wanna pull a scam with you.
Katara, you are fun. If nothing else, you're at least fun to argue with.
Katara! You're a genius! A sweaty, stinky genius!
This guy is too good! He shoots fire from his brain!
Hey, I got it! The perfect name for that guy: 'Combustion Man!'
Top of the morning, Momo!

It smells like old lady in here.
Aang, I know swimming is fun and all, but do you really think you should be exposing yourself like that?

See that girl with the silly pigtails? When she runs toward the ball, there's just the slightest hesitation of her left foot. I'm willing to bet a childhood injury has weakened her. Keep serving the ball to her left, and we'll destroy her and the rest of her team.
Yes! We defeated you for all time! You will never rise from the ashes of your shame and humiliation!
I'm so used to people worshiping us.
That's a sharp outfit, Chan. Careful. You could puncture the hull of an empire-class Fire Nation battleship, leaving thousands to drown at sea, because it's so sharp.
Oh, I'm glad you're here. Those boys won't leave me alone. I guess they all just like me too much.
Those boys only like you because you make it so easy for them. You're not a challenge. You're a tease. It's not like they actually care who you are.
What? You're jealous of me? But you're the most beautiful, smartest, perfect girl in the world.
Together, you and I will be the strongest couple in the entire world! We will dominate the Earth!
Your temper is out of control. You blow up over every little thing. You're so impatient and hotheaded and angry!
This is crazy! How can we beat a guy who blows things up with his mind?
I joined the circus because I was scared of spending the rest of my life as part of a matched set. At least I'm different now. 'Circus freak' is a compliment.

What do you want from me? You want a teary confession about how hard my childhood was? Well, it wasn't. I was a rich only child who got anything I wanted ... as long as I behaved and sat still, and didn't speak unless spoken to.
Calm down, you guys. This much negative energy is bad for your skin. You'll totally break out.
Bad skin? Normal teenagers worry about bad skin. I don't have that luxury. My father decided to teach me a permanent lesson on my face!

For so long I thought that if my dad accepted me, I'd be happy. I'm back home now, my dad talks to me. Ha! He even thinks I'm a hero. Everything should be perfect, right? I should be happy now, but I'm not. I'm angrier than ever and I don't know why!

Well, yes, I guess you're right. I don't have sob stories like all of you. I could sit here and complain how our mom liked Zuko more than me, but I don't really care. My own mother thought I was a monster. She was right, of course, but it still hurt.
You know Sokka, you should be more careful with that guard outfit on. I almost punched you in the gut.
I was just telling this dirty lowlife what I think of him!
Could I just get ten more seconds to rough him up a bit?
All I get is a letter? You could have least looked me in the eye when you ripped out my heart.
Because I'm a people person.
I don't need any protection.
Sorry, warden. You're my prisoner now.
Saving the jerk who dumped me.
I guess you just don't know people as well as you think you do. You miscalculated. I love Zuko more than I fear you.
No, you miscalculated! You should have feared me more!
I did. The best meat of all. The meat of friendship and fatherhood.
Seriously? You guys didn't find any meat?
You saved your uncle's sweaty sandal? Ugh!

Episode: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters

Episode: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters

Here is my wisdom for you: Selfless duty calls you to sacrifice your own spiritual needs, and do whatever it takes to protect the world.

Quote: I guess I don't have a choice, Momo. I have to kill the Fire Lord.

Episode: Sozin's Comet, Part 2: The Old Masters

Quote: Sozin's Comet is arriving, and our destinies are upon us. Aang will face the Fire Lord. When I was a boy, I had a vision that I would one day take Ba Sing Se. Only now do I see that my destiny is to take it back from the Fire Nation, so the Earth Kingdom can be free again.

Quote: Well that explains why I can't catch a fish around here, because normally my fishing skills are off the hook! Get it? Like a fishing hook?
Hmmm ... It's doable. But that means only two potty breaks today.
Now you look just like a little hill with horns! Bye, buddy!
These people are starving! But you'd turn your back on them? How can you be so cold and heartless?
Finagle away, oh schedule master.
I got it, how's this from now on, we'll take food breaks and potty breaks at the same time.
And I'm concerned because my big, furry friend doesn't feel well.
I know Hei Bai! We're close personal friends!
You know, you're really pretty, for a spirit. I don't meet too many spirits, but the ones I do meet, not very attractive.
You wanna destroy this factory?
I was joking! I also said to use spirit magic and made funny noises!
No, I will never, ever turn my back on people who need me!
You can't wait around for someone to help you. You have to help yourself.
Have I ever mentioned how sweet it is that you invented metalbending?
I don't think boomerang's coming back, Toph. It looks like this is the end.
I'd really rather our family physician look after Little Zuzu if you don't mind. Zuzu, you don't look so good!
Fire Lord Ozai, you and your forefathers have devastated the balance of this world, and now you shall pay the ultimate price!
To bend another's energy, your own spirit must be unbendable or you will be corrupted and destroyed.
I took away your firebending. You can't use it to hurt or threaten anyone else ever again.
Well, look at you, buster. Now that your firebending's gone I guess we should call you the Loser Lord.
Oh, sorry. Didn't mean to offend you, Phoenix King of Getting His Butt Whooped.
Yeah! Or how about King of the ... Guys Who ... Don't Win?
My uncle pulled some strings. And it doesn't hurt when the new Fire Lord is your boyfriend.
I think it means I actually kind of like you. But don't ever break up with me again!
Yeah, the girls and I really bonded in prison. And after a few chi-blocking lessons, they said I could join their group. We're going to be best friends forever.
